page.title: 10Clubs_Charity Shops
page.content: {Charities. }The Caring and Sharing shop supports 25 different charities. Approximately 20 people work there. They get writing paper,books and lots of other gifts sent in to sell for charities like Lifeboat and Save the Children Fund. {Volunteers.}The workers do not get paid but work in their free time. Most are retired people who enjoy helping. There are 2 men and the rest are women.Some of the staff have been working there at least 3 years.Some of the workers go in for 1 or 2 hours a week.Mr.Lubbock,the owner,had asked them if they would work in the shop unpaid {Customers.}In the summer there is more business than winter.They don't get many customers but they get a lot of things sent.
